title: How dangerous is turbulence on airplanes? Here's what you need to know
description: Over the past week, turbulence caused one death on a business jet and seven hospitalizations on a commercial flight. Here's what to know about how to keep yourself safe and why turbulence happens.

title: Former Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan says he won't challenge Trump in 2024 primary
description: Hogan said he would not seek the Republican nomination for president. He positioned himself as one of his party's fiercest critics of Donald Trump.

title: A massive fire tore through a crowded Rohingya refugee camp in Bangladesh
description: The blaze hit Sunday morning and has left thousands homeless. Some 740,000 Rohingya refugees have fled to Bangladesh from Myanmar since 2017, when the Myanmar military launched a brutal crackdown.

title: In Texas, Medicaid ends soon after childbirth. Will lawmakers allow more time?
description: In Texas, many uninsured people can access Medicaid if they get pregnant. But 2 months after giving birth, the coverage ends. Advocates say new moms need a full year, to improve maternal health.

title: Meet the volunteers bringing relief to the residents of embattled Bakhmut, Ukraine
description: Photographer Natalie Keyssar recounts the work of The Angels of Salvation, a group of volunteers dedicated to bringing aid to and helping to evacuate civilians in Ukraine's Donetsk region.

title: 6 scholars explain what a real climate solution is
description: We asked six climate experts what questions you should ask yourself whenever you come across something claiming to be a "climate solution".

title: Despite Republicans cooling on him, CPAC is still the Trump show
description: The Conservative Political Action Conference wrapped up Saturday with a speech by former President Donald Trump. Conference-goers cheered Trump even though his popularity within the party is waning.

title: Sen. Tim Scott is a different kind of Republican who could reshape the 2024 election
description: It should also be noted that making a show of presidential ambition early but then backing off has been an excellent way to get on the national ticket, albeit in the role of running mate.

title: Netflix's 'Chris Rock: Selective Outrage' reveals a lot of anger for Will Smith
description: Almost a year later, Chris Rock is still seething about 'The Slap' and he told an audience how much he now despises Will and Jada Pinkett Smith

title: A treaty to protect the world's oceans has been agreed after a decade of talks
description: For the first time, United Nations members have agreed on a unified treaty to protect biodiversity in the high seas.

title: Pushing for a post-COVID rebound, China targets GDP growth of "around 5%" this year
description: Outgoing premier Li Keqiang told delegates at the National People's Congress that China is aiming to rebound economically after COVID slowed them down

title: Activist Judy Heumann led a reimagining of what it means to be disabled
description: Heumann was instrumental in pushing to expand the civil rights of Americans with disabilities and continued to advocate for disability rights around the globe. She died on Saturday at age 75.

title: Rafael Viñoly, the architect behind the 'Walkie-Talkie' building, has died
description: The Uruguayan-born architect died unexpectedly this week from an aneurysm, his New York-based firm said. He was 78.
